description: Try our easy to follow Citrus-chicken Skewers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Skewer & kebab,Orange,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Chicken,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Citrus-chicken Skewers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut fillets into 4 pieces each. Thread onto skewers and lay in a shallow baking dish. Whisk juices, oil, chilli, paprika and garlic together in a bowl. Pour over skewers and chill for 1 hour to marinate.

Preheat a chargrill pan or barbecue grill over medium-high heat. Cook skewers for 5 minutes each side or until cooked and lightly charred. Serve with sliced lime. Tip 1: Add extra elegance and flavour to these skewers by serving with finely sliced chargrilled capsicum. Tip 2: Serving food on platters means everyone can help themselves.
